content: my husband bought a set of uneek sock twins 2x220 yards or 2x50g for me for christmas one year i wanted to make the most of the beautiful matched self-striping yarn and the idea of legwarmers suddenly came to me i loved them so much i had to make another pair this one for one of my best friends these legwarmers can easily be made larger or smaller around by increasing or decreasing the cast on by a multiple of 4 stitches you may need more yarn to get the length you want if you make the legwarmers larger around for each pair of legwarmers you will need one set of uneek sock twins you may want to make more than one
